snippet.title: Disco Samurai Trailer
snippet.description:
Disco Samurai is a unique rhythm combat game in a cyberpunk setting. Challenge your skills by smoothly combining attacks, parries, dashes, and other abilities to the beat of the electronic music. Crank up the volume and seize the rhythm of the electrifying synth wave and rock soundscape!

The game will be available on PC [Steam], PlayStation 4, PlayStation 5, Xbox One, Xbox Series S|X and Nintendo Switch.

Wishlist NOW: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2576410/Disco_Samurai/
